name: The Lift - Hotel Orpheus
description:
Before you check into Room 1309, can you escape from the faulty elevator lift? This short game is the Prologue to the full "Room 1309" game (also available now on the App Store). Follow the clues and solve puzzles in this Escape Room game.

FEATURES:
• Free to play!
• Dozens of puzzles and clues
• Hand drawn artwork and animation
• Intriguing story
